website_summaries.verdict: Great price for a durable, reliable cane with a terrific warranty.
pros: one of the most stable canes on the market
cons: The huge, 4-pronged foot is very stable, but it can also be unwieldy in narrower passages

customer_reviews.title: All 4 legs not equal, potentially dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: This cane was purchased for my mother who had recently fallen. Initially she said she loved it but then would not use it any longer. She finally told us the cane was wobbly. Her 3 siblings tried using it and agreed, it was wobbling, the 4 feet are NOT level. Our mother is back to using her old cane and we are looking for another cane.
customer_reviews.author: George Gates

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: It's just OK. I'm a nurse who worked in rehab and used quad canes for my parents...this is not stable and the feet seem uneven. Aggravating to think about having to bother to return it. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Nice  Quality but not stable
customer_reviews.text: My Dad's PT recommended this item who had a massive stroke. The shipment arrived on time and nicely packaged. The cane is good quality and it appears as is described on Amazon, however, it was shaky and not stable. We ensured that the tips are equally inserted, didn't make a difference. Then replaced them with a pack of tips that I bought along with it, still wasn't sturdy and stable. It's a real disappointment and will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: nikkius

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime guarantee NOT !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item since it was lifetime guarantee. Delivered in May, and the covers on legs are falling apart. I had a much cheaper cane 2 years nothing happened to it. Tried to return and I get message only 1 month allowed to return!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion this cane is way too wobbly, ...
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this cane is way too wobbly, it was impossible to use it for stability during walking. The handle isn't ergonomic. I had to send it back because of the instability of the cane.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Bought the cane for my mom she is getting unstable with the single leg cane. Bought this in July. It seemed to be working out great until 430am this morning . My mom got out of bed and fell I found the cane next to her broken. Unfortunately I am unable to return the cane. After 4 months of use it shouldn’t break. I am heading in to the closest town and hopefully I can replace her cane with a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: An economical, sturdy quad cane
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this quad cane for my elderly mother, and it has been very helpful for her. It is sturdy, well-made and lightweight so it is easy for her to carry. It was a simple matter to adjust the height of the cane simply by pushing in a brass button and sliding it apart to the appropriate stop. It also is easy to flip it around for either left or right-handed use. The legs have sturdy, non-slip rubber pads that prevent the cane from slipping and also help prevent marring your floor. In addition it comes in several attractive colors.
customer_reviews.author: RickyBobbyCatTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice color my son love blue, he haven't used it yet. It was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Much safer than other canes.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my Nana who was previously using the "hurrycane" - that cane spent more time on the floor than anything else. I never felt secure in her using it and despite what they say it does NOT stand alone. Nevertheless, this cane is great! Super stable. Was a little awkward to get used to and it is a little heavier but she has adjusted well and never forgets to use it! Definitely worth a try for preventive ambulation assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Lexigirl45

customer_reviews.title: i was very disappointed that the item cannot be returned
customer_reviews.text: This item is not stable on uneven surfaces. i was very disappointed that the item cannot be returned. The no return policy was not apparent until attempting to return.
customer_reviews.author: Klh

customer_reviews.title: This cane makes my husband smile...
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a stoke a month ago and has weakness on his right side. He is able to walk with the use of a quad cane. Since he is being discharged from rehab, we needed to get one for home. This purple quad cane is perfect. It is sturdy, adjustable and the color makes my husband smile!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S.

customer_reviews.title: Quad Cane bests the other styles of canes
customer_reviews.text: This cane is perfect for someone with moderate balance problems. It is the best choice for someone with the challenge of staircases to navigate as it helps to stabilize each step as one ascends or descends the stairs. The best scenario is to also utilize the hand rail at the same time. The Quad Cane is far superior compared to a regular cane, or even the cane with the tripod-like feet. If the Quad Cane does fall to the floor one can right it by pushing down on one of the exposed feet and it will likely pop right back up to be within your reach.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: how I get around.
customer_reviews.text: I had an accident which left me with half a foot. 20 weeks ago. in the hospital bed bound for 6 weeks them wheelchair bound for 10 weeks. now in therapy to build muscle strength on my hip knee and learn to walk again. so I purchased your product I was pleased how Quickly I received it. well packaged ,easy to put together, sturdy, good color and very helpful to me. now my therapy sessions are working with me to start to balance and walk once again THANK YOU! for a good quality for a reasonable price. JOSE.
customer_reviews.author: Jose g.

customer_reviews.title: Read return information in full
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, it is going back because it does not work for me. It is a tripping hazard for me with my poor gait as I have an Achilles tendon problem. It is attractive, lightweight as advertised. However, the shipping fee to return it bothers me so I would suggest that anyone buying this look to see if the return site is close to home. It is not at all close to me so I must pay the $7.xx fee.
customer_reviews.author: Padraigin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: Overall attractive design for this Vive cane, especially in the bronze color choice. This item is equipped with a substantial rubber hand grip, which provides better support for the user than canes made with only a small soft foam grip handle. In addition, the 4 quad cane "feet" at the bottom of the cane allow for a sturdy, even base to ensure the safety of the user.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewsAmz

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of work!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 215# and 6'-2" and have had the cane for approximately 2 weeks. I have had no problems with it at all! If you are thinking about it ,then get one! Onlyony one suggestion if I could. I was wondering if you could make it with a smoother roll while walking? Yeah I know, quit bitchin' and go! Just would be mice to not have a choppy feel to it. I realize I'm still getting used to it. Thanks Vive! and nice work by the way!
customer_reviews.author: RIK

customer_reviews.title: Great Help
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to build up strength in my legs and back and help with balance. Because of arthritis I use a rollator outside my house but I wanted to strengthen my legs and back and improve my balance. I have a regular can but it is not stable because my wrist wobbles. I thought this might help and had heard good things about it. This is wonderful. I use it to move around my apartment and it is doing exactly what I want. Great support and stability. I am thinking of getting another on next month to replace the one in my car. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: sjd402

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Vive Adjustable Quad Cane
customer_reviews.text: I rec'd it yesterday, I like it better than my Hurricane Cane. It weighs a little bit more than the Hurricane, however, it's more stable, stands on it's own and helps me with my balance issues whereas the Hurricane didn't. I highly recommend it. It also comes with a height measuring guide and tips!
customer_reviews.author: Evie Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Need a great cane for balancing issues, Buy this one. Buy it! It's what you need. Ol' Joe
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I just bumped up to the Cadillac of canes. Sleek design, cool color, adjustable height, stand on it's own, plus supports my weight easily. The only thing it doesnt have is seat warmers. Perfect for someone with balancing issues. I have Parkinson's. I cant fool around with buting an inferior cane. The wide spread of the feet allow for that type of balance, and it also aids in its ability to free-stand. You need a cane, buy this one. You'll be happy with it, I'm telling ya.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Stable Feeling
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just my unit, but the little feet on the bottom don't lend a sure-footed feeling when trying to walk with it, they have an uneven rocking feel and my arm ends up wobbley as I go instead of feeling surely planted. I gave up after a couple of days and went back to using my crutches. Maybe adding an extra layer of larger rubber tips from the hardware store will help make the contact of the feet to the ground more solid, but I haven't tried that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Becky S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mother in-law. She broke her leg and was off her feet for 8 weeks. Then some very minimal walking with a walker for 2 weeks, now walker and some cane use for stairs. She loves this cane and how sturdy it is. We had the hurricane* (sp?) but it was not nearly as stable as this one. This cane does not break down in three pieces for easy transport, but I think that what gives it more stability. the other one may be better for down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Jewell

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The handle of this cane has a very hard surface and is awkward to use. The base does not provide enough base to create a sense of balance for me. I have bone on bone knee joints with osteoporosis and I am new to using a cane. This is my first attempt to use a cane so my opinion and experience may not apply for others,but I wish I had had some input in order to make a more informed choice.
customer_reviews.author: whitherwe

customer_reviews.title: new better material on the handles
customer_reviews.text: I had problems with handles after a year of use. They were out of order, because the material was very soft. I wrote to the seller, and he gave the refund. I made the order once more. The new walking sticks have better, solid material on the handles.
customer_reviews.author: Inna Estrina

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second cane I have bought for my Mother. She is 87 and very wobbly. This cane she loves! She is pleased with the weight, the grip and how well it stands up on its own. We will be buying another one for her. Wish they came in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: pearly girl

customer_reviews.title: Stable after adjustment
customer_reviews.text: I had to work a bit with the canes to have the 4 "feet" on each cane to be level so the canes would sit flat, firmly. I like the canes but think a bit more care could be extended to make them ready to use as they come out of the box. When they feel wobbly due to uneven feet it does not make the user feel confident in stability.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality adjustable cane
customer_reviews.text: Great cane from Mom. She's about 4'11" tall and it came at a perfect height for her. I think it would accommodate a much taller person also, as there are notches to adjust. Very stable and mom really likes it. Love the hand strap, and the wonderful rubber feet. Mom was happy to have a color that she likes. Purple! Would definitely recommend, well made and very sturdy, but very lightweight also
customer_reviews.author: cookinmama

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and maintains balance
customer_reviews.text: This came is built very well. Helps maintain more balance and control when walking. It's much more steadier than a cane with one leg on the bottom. The price is great and appearance is wonderful too! Would highly recommend this product to others!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for Assisted Walking
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cane for an assist when rising from bed. I use it for walking several steps in the morning until my stiff back relaxes. It probably would be good for use throughout the day, so consistent use could be in my future. Right now, the limited use is just what I need. I lean fairly heavily against it and find it is very stable and sturdy. It's been a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: A Handy Helper
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cane because I have arthritis in both knees and at times it is difficult to walk. This gives me the support I need plus the confidence to keep from falling. I would recommend it for any person that has difficulty walking.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: It is a great cane! In addition to supporting weight it is ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great cane! In addition to supporting weight it is excellent for shaking everything from the neighbor kids to the cruel, relentless sky. In a pinch you can use it to hook a leg, or swipe items off a table. And it is purple! (*singing "purple cane, purple cane")
customer_reviews.author: Agent Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just as shown.  Adjustment information not included, just emailed.
customer_reviews.text: The cane is just as described. 4 stars instead of 5 because the adjustment insructions were emailed to me, several hundred miles away from the user, and not included with the product. It's only a one-page leaflet. Someone who didn't know what they were doing set the cane too high, which might have caused the user to lose her balance. It did make her not want to use it at all. It took a few days before it was adjusted correctly and now I don't know if she's using it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marji

customer_reviews.title: New for Me
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little getting used to as I only use one of my 14 canes. I walk around my house w and w/o a cane (depending on the pain) because I feel safe; however, outside I don't feel as safe especially walking on anything that isn't straight or different texture (I have tile in my home). I used it walking to the mail box and I felt more secure. Perhaps next time I'll order a 3-prong one.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Carpinelli

customer_reviews.title: did not provide even support on any surface for someone ...
customer_reviews.text: did not provide even support on any surface for someone who has mobility issues. may work for those who just need minimal support need
customer_reviews.author: freekcus

customer_reviews.title: VIVE HEALth is the company to use if you need a quad foot cane.
customer_reviews.text: “This quad cane is great, I have one and decided to buy this one as a back up because I can only use a quad cane. Item as described, arrived on time. And the quality and workmanship is equal to what can be bought at a medical store, but the price is less and very reasonable.”
customer_reviews.author: JAA

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by the Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of this quad cane... One for the house and the other one is in the car... They are well built... No problems... I am 6'1.. . and weight 215 lbs... I don't have any trouble with the cane... Like I said before.... They are well built and Nice metal body... There was no sway in the cane body... Everything is Great...
customer_reviews.author: Steven C. Goble

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It's for my grandfather and is just perfect. It's very durable, has a comfortable handle. It's lightweight but is very supportive and easy to walk. Height adjustment is easy and it arrived in 2 days. I spent a few trips to local stores that didn't have the variety or even this standing model. It's worth the price - which is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Trendy Color & Well Designed, Sturdy Cane!
customer_reviews.text: My Vive Adjustable Quad Cane was delivered on the date promised. The cane is WONDERFUL, trendy color/design, easy to adjust to my height, no assembly required & I truly feel secure walking using this cane as I continue on my post surgery recovery & PT. The four prong base ensures body balance & stands alone without falling over. The cane has flexible functionality in that you can use with left or right handed. I would DEFINITELY recommend this cane!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie G.

customer_reviews.title: Keeping me steady and stress free
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as I gradually go from a walker to a cane after a long bed-bound illness. I like that it keeps me steady as I am relearning how to walk again with a newly repaired ankle. I am able to use the cane to go up and down steps which really makes me feel more independent and human! And, it's purple, so what's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Christine Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Great Cane For A Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: The Vive adjustable quad cane is exactly what I needed . The package came quickly and the price for this quality cane was the lowest I could find anywhere. The cane is easy to adjust and comfortable to use. Being a quad, it's easy to find since I can "park" it next to my chair when not in use. Customer service is great as well! Seller provided great instructions for proper fit of the cane and has made sure that I as a customer am satisfied and pleased with the cane! Great customer service is important to me!
customer_reviews.author: JimTexK

customer_reviews.title: Try is quad cane.  You'll like it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has used several canes over the past few years, including one that was able to stand on its own if you positioned it carefully. This cane with 4 widely-spaced feet is really great! It stands easily, and fits in the car footwell when she is a passenger. We were afraid that she might kick the feet as she walked, but that hasn't been a problem. The price was really good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ancient One

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sturdy cane at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness and stability of this cane. I love the ergonomic handle and the loop you can wrap around your hand. I especially appreciate that you can make it right or left handed. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Fauchier

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work as well as described
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother who is struggling more with post polio the older she gets. Had to take it apart and grease/play with the spring lock to get it to lock in for right handed use. The pin still doesn't pop out all the way to lock in place but I believe I got it out enough to work. If one of the grandkids gets ahold of it and pushes the lock pin in I'll have to take it apart again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, and very attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this quad cane for my 91 year old Mother. She's been using a chrome institutional type quad cane for years. This is one of the best things I've ever gotten for her! It weighs about half the old one. It is a beautiful piece of equipment. She claims that it's hardly noticeable when she uses it. And, she said the grip is far superior to her old one. All in all - you can't go wrong purchasing this quad cane.
customer_reviews.author: AzChef

customer_reviews.title: Stable and sharp looking!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend the classy looking quad cane. Easy to adjust, comfortable for my 5 ft. ht. a soft impact on the walkway. The only thing was that my stability required a step up. I can walk without support like a cane. What I found out that I needed way a way to sit down when I felt dizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Too big for stairs.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to use when walking up stairs because the base is too big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust to correct height
customer_reviews.text: I especially like the cloth loop that I can put over my wrist when I need my hand to hold something other than the cane handle and still take the cane with me instead of having to go back to get the cane after I deposit the item in my hand that uses the cane.
customer_reviews.author: Nila R. Saylor

customer_reviews.title: Best Quad Cane Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for my mother and she loved it better than her stand alone single canes; however, she fell recently and hates walkers, so I am attempting to have her use one quad cane on either side for stability. I got the same color as last time and love it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Debra T.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality very stable
customer_reviews.text: Is very good steady is a the one I used now and look well because is for precaution after my accident I am terrify to fall I love to look nice and do not look bad on the contrary ,the one from England is too unsecured
customer_reviews.author: Corie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: This cane is sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This cane is sturdy and easy to use. The pedestal is metal and is, however, not really "lightweight". The last cane I had which sported the same width four foot pedestal was made of plastic and was half the lifting weight of this one.. I tried to get the other type but Amazon said it was no longer offered.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cane! I have a balance problem and this really helps me with stability! I also love the fact that I can stand it next to me when I sit down and it stays upright. I tried the hurry cane but that made me trip and it does not stand up like it says it does!
customer_reviews.author: Rosaliers

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to use, overall great product.
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my grandfather as I noticed he was having difficulty walking and knew he was too proud to buy one for himself. He joked about how I thought he was old but now he is using it all the time and is moving around more than he use to. He loves how he can let go and it will still be standing there for him.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie B

customer_reviews.title: He loves that it's sturdy, adjustable and stands upright - so he doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Dad loves this. It arrived quickly and just as described. He loves that it's sturdy, adjustable and stands upright - so he doesn't have to bend down to get it off the floor, etc. It gives him support and the feeling of security he/we desire on both the hardwood floors, tile and area rugs.The color is great too! I would definitely purchase this again - if needed - or another item from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I used this during my recovery from surgery. It is really well made, stable and useful. I’ll save it for my old age, when I need it again. 😀
customer_reviews.author: George Blasing

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far I am pleased. The cane appears sturdy and easily adjustable. My husband is pleased. A previous cane purchased from Amazon was dangerous because the cane suddenly separated from the base and even with really strong glue was not able to be used. I will wait some time to see if this cane does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Miller

customer_reviews.title: The cane is lightweight and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: What I like best about this cane is how lightweight it is. I have noticed no unevenness as mentioned in a few other reviews. Much better than the standard cane.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Staker

customer_reviews.title: Broad, easy to grip handle.  Cool violet color.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the cane is great. My mom took it to physical therapy and they showed her how to use it properly. She enjoys the fact that, unlike a single point cane, it stays upright and available and doesn't constantly fall when she puts it down. Only one complaint and that is that the instructions told you to depress the brass pin or something like that, but on the diagram there was nothing called a brass pin. In fact the brass pin was identified by some other name, so that was very confusing. I had to call the company, but they very swiftly helped me to switch from left to right.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy/Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great cane highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! I love this cane! Makes me feel more stable and provides great support. I have arthritis in my fingers, hands and wrist and the large grip is very easy for me to use. I am so happy I ordered this. It arrived exactly as promised. The box was a little smashed needed some packing to keep box stable. But cane was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stability and confidence
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this cane makes me feel stable, getting up out of chairs, etc. I have a very bad back. I am in pain almost all the time. This cane gives me confidence when I am at my weekest. I can now get in and out of my car easier. I love the adjustable height and the four quad legs. It adjust for right or left hand. Very sturdy and attractive too!
customer_reviews.author: FayeH

customer_reviews.title: Walking cane
customer_reviews.text: I liked using the 4 pronged cane but I would suggest only using it for a short time. It is heavy for an elderly woman to use for an extended time. It does help you balance when walking which I liked. Eventually I had to switch to a single cane which was much lighter to get around with.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry H.

customer_reviews.title: Old style better
customer_reviews.text: Cane is unsteady although it has four rubber legs touching the ground. Cane drags on clothing making it prone to trip user. Handle doesn't help steady user even though I am 6-2 and have large hands. Can't imagine smallish woman or man using this item at all.
customer_reviews.author: charles gaines

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cane!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother. She is getting up there in age and needed a good cane with good stability. She is very pleased with it, and it is of excellent quality. She expects to get many years of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: diesel85

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cane for my wife at the suggestion of her therapist. The original cane was damaged. However, VIVE Health responded very quickly to my email & were very helpful I. Getting a replacement. The cane itself is exactly what we expected. I would highly recommend VIVE Health as their customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This is not what you want if you’re looking for stability
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cane as a support after having knee surgery. I have never used it because the cane is not sturdy. It wobbles when pressure is on it. Very poor quality. It’s negligent to sell such a poor product to people who already have support issues. I’m sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Burgess

customer_reviews.title: great cane
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my disabled husband, it works the best for him and have 4 feet on the bottom eliminates him from having to look for a place to put his cane. Only problem i had was the rubber feet kept coming off the bottom I had to purchase a second set and then glued them all on.
customer_reviews.author: Pat K      Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Help For Grandma!
customer_reviews.text: “Purchased this for my Mother In Law and she uses it inside her home ever since she got it! It's light weight, sit's very nicely on the carpet, helps her with balance, not to mention up and down her stairs which take her to her patio!! it really helps her stay her feet!! The color is really nice, too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Don't need it all the time but when I do...it's great
customer_reviews.text: "Love it. Went to the art museum with it. Lot of standing and balancing. Base a little hard to adjust. Directions not right. Worked fine. Going to the Strand in Galveston tomorrow. Many ground level stairs. Then beach. Glad to have it."
customer_reviews.author: Just Sharon

customer_reviews.title: The walking stick workds exactly like it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: My husband, who has great difficulty with balance, uses this cane all the time. It is very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cane for my mother. Her cane was constantly slipping to the floor when she was seated at the table or in a chair. This cane stays in place and provides far more stability than her old cane when she is walking. The color (blue) is great and she loves it. The fact that the length is adjustable is really helpful too as she is not very tall. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SF Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great handle
customer_reviews.text: Great product-changes the pressure point(s) that a conventional cane has-transfers pressure more to the heel on the hand and distributes the weight throughout the hand-the only disappointing thing with this product-is the tip is NOT self supporting-cane will not stand on its own
customer_reviews.author: JHH

customer_reviews.title: Great Quad Cane
customer_reviews.text: I ordered quad cane based on ratings and color. Very sturdy for me post surgery. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: SWaltman

customer_reviews.title: It is lightweight and it gives good suppport
customer_reviews.text: my daughter and I love this games this is the second one that we have we got the first one for me for my back and then we got the second one for my daughter two years and she's using both of them at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and she’s very happy with it. She never wanted to use a cane but this one has her. She likes the red and how she feels more supported than a regular cane. The customer service is THE best! Thanks, Jaydee :) They are quick to respond and want to be sure you are satisfied. I appreciate companies who stand by their products and the customer service shows just that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One was great; got a second one!
customer_reviews.text: I first needed the extra support for recovery from my hip operation. Now with my foot operation two years later, I need one for the car and one for home. Most dependable, good colors and prices!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny B10

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color blue.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this quad cane for my father who is mainly bedridden. He attempts to get out of bed and walk for a few minutes each day using a regular cane in one hand and this quad cane in the other. My father is about 6'2" and around 200 pounds and it supports his weight just fine. My mother said it's a beautiful color blue.
customer_reviews.author: Roni M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reinforced walking aid
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for going up and down stairs when a walker is not practical. Terrific post-walker, pre-cane tool. Very smart and clever design. Totally swear by it. (Used after knee replacement.)
customer_reviews.author: louise

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Having two bad knees, and balance issues, this came is a must. I feel more secure because of the four legs rather than one stick. Like that it can stand alone beside me too when I rest. I got the purple. Love the color. So do many woman who stop to tell me. Wish I wood have bought one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: loves2read50

customer_reviews.title: Dad loves his new quad cane
customer_reviews.text: I ordered as a gift for my day who turned 83 years young. Dad was using a regular cane and refused he needed additional support. Dad have a hip replacement and ulcers on both legs just above his ankles, which are usually swollen due to poor circulation. Dad loves his new cane he does not put it down. He walks up and down the stairs in the house comfortably. He is so happy with the gift he requested than I order another one for his older brother my uncle.
customer_reviews.author: Delhi

customer_reviews.title: Wideer base helps
customer_reviews.text: This quad vane helps me from falling over. The wide bottom is better then my regular cane. Highly recommended! This is the best cane and has kept me fro falling mant times. One thing is over time the color wears on the handle. The blue is beautiful but my handle is turning pink.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: THE SECOND TIME'S A KEEPER
customer_reviews.text: The first cane was definitely lopsided, but the replacement was awesome. The time frame in which Amazon corrected the situation was amazing. I called Vive, since it was definitely a manufacturing problem and not shipping damage, they passed the buck. I don't know if the whole ordeal was protocol, but I love the cane I now have. The color is cool too!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Bork

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and stable for my mom as she recovers from a broken hip. I like that it has four legs which increases stability. I got nervous bc it was so inexpensive, but it really is exactly what she needs and safe.
customer_reviews.author: jth

customer_reviews.title: He has a lot of trouble getting around lately & gets dizzy easy. Ever since I gave him the cane
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cane for my Dad. He has a lot of trouble getting around lately & gets dizzy easy. Ever since I gave him the cane, he always has it by his side. It seems to be sturdy, he is tall and it adjusted very well to his height. He is very happy with his cane & it seems to give him security.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: TIP - I was in the hospital lobby and saw two others with the same cane. Think I may need to put some racing stripes on mine.
customer_reviews.text: What I like the most about this is the 4 on the floor. Who wants to set a cane down, have it fall and then suffer the pain of having to bend down and pick it up ? The 4 legs are perfect since I can just leave it standing and walk away. GREAT. I gave it 4 stars because I wish it were just a little bit more heavy duty. Although I'm only about 210 pounds sometimes I need to put most of my weight on it. On the other hand, if it were more heavy duty I be carrying a barbell so all in all I was actually thinking of getting a second one.
customer_reviews.author: TOMARIO

customer_reviews.title: Very Stable
customer_reviews.text: The quad feature of this cane enhances stability and I like it above all other singe canes I have tried. I can also hang my purse on it and not have to search for a place to park it since it stands on its own. Really do like it!!
customer_reviews.author: KRS

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, very stable canes!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best canes! This Vibe brand is the best I’ve found even from buying thru medical equipment stores. I go through a lot of canes and have had many break to the point I’ve gotten injured. These last longer and come in great colors!
customer_reviews.author: SusanRaeTulsa

customer_reviews.title: Rubber caps are uneven causing wobbling. Caps seem to worn down, ill formed.
customer_reviews.text: I do not feel safe or stabilized when using this cane, because the rubber foot caps seem to be uneven, and causes wobbling/unsteadiness when I attempted to use the cane. Rubber caps seem to be worn down. I am returning the cane for exchange or refund. Please provide instructions to return/exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Vandora Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Light weight cane
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandma who has been stumbling recently. She has had previous canes before and never used them. But we got this one for her because it was the lightest cane I saw on amazon. Shipped fast and was very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy cane easy to adjust and walk with
customer_reviews.text: At first it felt a little heavy from the four prong base but after using for a couple of weeks feels natural. Love the ppurple color and how adjustable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn K. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: This is a must if your looking for a cane!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cane. Ordered it for my mother and because of the four feet she is a lot more stable. A secure feeling. Also what I love about this is it stands on its own. Which is great because when you sit down it's right beside you instead of laying the the floor. Price was good and very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Will be doing some unusual walking soon so will update if any changes. I like the vibrant color I picked (red) and like that it has it’s own stand. Seems steady, handle fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby and Casey’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking and Supportive Quad Cane!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one quad cane after a friend recommended that I try it. I liked it so well and found it to be so supportive that I bought 2 more to have in different parts of the house !! Excellent and safe !!
customer_reviews.author: FELINA

customer_reviews.title: Not as promised
customer_reviews.text: I chose this cane because the listing said it could support up to 300lbs. but the product tag shows a max of 250lbs. Also, the cane is not all that sturdy and wobbles a bit - I think it's because the feet are fairly close together. It will technically still work for helping get in and out of the shower (I recently injured my knee hiking) but I would not feel safe using it to walk any distance so I guess I'm stuck with crutches for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: rubber feet fall off
customer_reviews.text: Liked the product, but after 3 days 2 of the rubber feet started to come off. When that happens you have no choice but to retrace very step you have made that day. Tried to order spare tips online, but did not find a link. Offices are closed on Sat and Sun so if you loose one on a Friday you can't order until Monday by phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jann H.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and well designed.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my dad and he was very happy. Said he loves the way the grip is and the color is perfect for him. Very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly walking cane
customer_reviews.text: Well made cane, is not as stable as I thought it would. Wobbly when walking with it. I don't believe the 4 prongs are large enough. A bit disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: E. Badger

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: This cane was made well and arrived in 2 days I thought this would solve the problem of my cane falling over what seemed like 100 times a day plus give me more stability but it did not work for me. Maybe if I would have started out using this cane initially it would have given me more safety, since I did not I was very wobbly and clumsy using this cane so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: MommaBird

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME, this is not a ‘cane’, it’s a support system. This takes stability to a new level. I can use this on sand walking my dog near the ocean. Snow, sand, gravel, dirt, whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Quad Cane...Bit Heavy for Me
customer_reviews.text: I like that this cane is very sturdy but it is a bit heavy for me too use. I would recommend for a larger person without strength issues.
customer_reviews.author: Echism

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great secure handle grip. Very comfortable. Adjusts to a wide range of heights. Love all the color selections. Very stable. Better than the one the medical equipment company sent.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist is extremely impressed with the VIVE cane. The cane is sturdier than a ingle point cane and safer for me right now. This cane will be a starting point to me walking again after my stroke. I am still getting used to walking with it. I like it because it is lightweight but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dakotaboy11

customer_reviews.title: Reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the item for my elder friend, he said its very firm and comfortable... i have to admit, he is happy, i am assuming its worth the feedback!.
customer_reviews.author: Eliseo Espinoza

Each prong is capped with a rubber, non skid, non-marking tip for added stability and convenience.
